test.name: TC-001 Validate Input Form - All Required Fields

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.msg: Typing text 'Test User' into text field 'id=name'.

kw.msg: Selecting options from selection list 'xpath=//*[@id="seleniumform"]/div[3]/div[1]/select' by value TH.
kw.doc: Selects options from selection list ``locator`` by ``values``.

kw.name: Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Get Text
kw.msg: ${message} = Thanks for contacting us, we will get back to you shortly.
kw.doc: Returns the text value of the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Should Contain
kw.arg: Thanks for contacting us, we will get back to you shortly.
kw.doc: Fails if ``container`` does not contain ``item`` one or more times.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.
